title: How to Find a Water Leak in Your House

steps.headline: Check the garden.
steps.description: Look at hoses, taps, and drip irrigation systems.

steps.headline: Check the shower head for leaks.
steps.description: It should be a fairly straightforward home repair if this is a source of leaking.

steps.headline: If you have a swimming pool, it is important to check to see if it has any leaks.

tyn: Internet or Yellow Pages to find a plumber - it's helpful to ask other people who they trust as plumbers, along with checking online sites that allow consumers to rate tradespeople
